name: Miami Bass
description: Sustained Roland TR-808 kick drums and faster tempos, along with a distinct Electro influence.

children.name: Atlanta Bass
children.description: Originated in Atlanta, slower tempos and a more melodic approach than Miami Bass.

children.description: Originated in Atlanta, slower tempos and a more melodic approach than Miami Bass.

children.name: Tamborzão
children.description: Adds Afro-Brazilian percussive elements such as the atabaque sound into the Miami Bass kick drums.

children.name: Techno Bass
children.description: Minimal, stripped-down with an emphasis on low-frequency bass partitions.
